column1: Traffic reports will resume Friday November 12 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Arcadia Park:
column4: Both lanes are blocked until further notice due to a damaged utility pole as a result of an earlier collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for Nicholasville Rd at Arcadia Park:
column4: Traffic is using the center turn lane.  KU repair crews are on scene.  Expect delays potentially for several hours.
